name: Interactpitch
tagline: Interactive pitch decks with real-time viewer insights
description: InteractPitch turns your pitch deck into an interactive experience. After you share the deck ahead of a call, investors go through it with your AI avatar stepping in to explain and add context when needed. Interactpitch gives founders real time insights into who viewed the pitch, how deeply they engaged, which sections mattered, and what questions came up, so your first investor call starts confident and well prepared.

name: daily.dev Recruiter
tagline: Hire from the world's largest developer community
description: Access passive talent who only respond on daily.dev. Post your role, get matched, and meet engineers who actually want to talk. Developers already use daily.dev every day to learn and grow. We‚Äôre now opening our network for hiring.

name: Typeless for Android
tagline: First AI voice keyboard for Android
description: Stop typing on your Android. Start talking with the first truly intelligent voice keyboard. Typeless turns your natural speech into polished messages, emails, and docs‚Äî10x faster than your thumbs.

name: Evernote v11
tagline: Your second brain, leveled up.
description: Evernote v11 is here! The Evernote you love, evolved. Use AI Assistant for smarter interactions with your notes, AI Meeting Notes for recordings with multi-speaker transcription, and a more powerful search that understands the meaning behind your words.

name: Figy.ai
tagline: AI Flashcards That Grow as You Learn
description: Figy is a free AI that turns any topic or content into smart flashcards that actually stick. Upload notes, articles, or documents and get beautifully crafted AI flashcards in seconds. Learn faster, retain more, and stay in flow as Figy keeps updating and improving your cards while you learn. Perfect for students, educators, and lifelong learners who want learning to be engaging and memorable.

name: Dopamine.chat
tagline: Effortlessly build your AI team for everything you do
description: There are tons of agent and workflow builders out there, but most come with heavy setup, long ramp-up, and way too much overhead. Dopamine is built to remove all of that. It helps you actually get things done: move faster, stay organized, learn quicker, and stay ahead without friction. Create flexible, mission-ready AI team members in minutes, not weeks, and use them anywhere in your life or work.

name: Trace
tagline: F**k The Algorithm. Make Your Own
description: Trace helps you keep up by pulling content from multiple sources ‚Äî like YouTube, Reddit, Hacker News, Medium, and X ‚Äî into one place. It learns from your work and feedback, remembers what matters, and surfaces signals from across the web without pulling you in.

name: Rippletide Eval CLI
tagline: Rippletide CLI is an evaluation tool for AI agents
description: Rippletide CLI is an interactive terminal tool to evaluate AI agent endpoints directly from your command line. It generates questions from the agent‚Äôs knowledge, supports predefined questions for reproducible benchmarking, and delivers clear hallucination KPIs. Get instant feedback on performance with real time progress, automatic evaluation, and detailed reports.

name: Sapiare New Tab
tagline: Find inspiration every time you open a new tab.
description: Do you build products and companies? This minimal new-tab page showcases evocative visual thinking, a curated collection of paintings, and tweet-style quotes from history‚Äôs brightest minds.

name: MCPJam Inspector
tagline: Test + develop ChatGPT apps and MCP apps (ext-apps) locally
description: MCPJam inspector is the local testing tool for ChatGPT apps and MCP servers. Build your apps locally with MCPJam's widget emulator and test against any LLM in the playground. Inspect your MCP server‚Äôs tools, resources, prompts, and OAuth flows. No more ngrok or ChatGPT subscription needed.

name: Translator
tagline: Translate any video to 30+ languages with latest AI
description: Desktop app for AI-powered video translation. Download videos from YouTube, transcribe with Whisper, translate to 30+ languages using GPT + Claude for quality review, and dub with AI voices. Free subtitle editing included. Open source & privacy-focused.

name: Foldr for MacOS
tagline: A Finder extension to create folders with custom icons
description: A simple Finder extension that lets you create folders with personality. No more generic blue folders, just right-click and pick your icon. Organize your Mac the way it should look. Yours. ‚Ä¶it's that easy.

name: relayd
tagline: Remote control for your Codex agents. Ship from anywhere.
description: Most tools let you monitor agents. relayd lets you control them ‚Äî from your phone. A lightweight daemon connects your local Codex to a mobile PWA. Get push notifications when agents finish, see full context, and push to continue with one tap. Your code never leaves your machine. Unlike generic monitoring tools, relayd is built specifically for agentic coding workflows. It's not just alerts ‚Äî it's a remote control. Built by an indie dev, for indie devs. Your desk is now optional.

name: Caffeine Curfew iOS App
tagline: Track caffeine intake, hydration, and master your sleep
description: Caffeine Curfew is a native iOS and WatchOS App that allows user to track the active half life decay of their caffeine intake. We support Apple Heath Integration, Homescreen Widgets, and we offer sleep analysis tools to help users get a better understanding of their productivity and rest. We take pride in listening to our users and iterating quickly.

name: Habitz
tagline: Goal planner & progress
description: Small habits. Big change. Stay consistent, focused, and in control - one day at a time. Habitz is a modern habit tracker designed to help you: Start habits easily Stay consistent every day See real progress over time Whether you want to: - build healthy habits - improve focus and productivity - quit bad habits - create structure in your day Habitz keeps you on track.

name: Moldable
tagline: Personal software. Built for change.
description: Build local apps that work exactly how you think ‚Äî powered by AI, shaped by conversation. Everything's local on your machine, so you own it & can evolve it. Need a starting point? Use our free apps, like meeting recorder, notes, translation journal, and more https://moldable.sh/apps You have powers now. Go use them.

name: Stroke
tagline: Animate SVGs. Beautifully.
description: Create Hand-drawn SVG animations for logos, signatures, and illustrations.

name: 3D Viewer for Google Drive
tagline: A simple yet powerful 3D viewer for Google Drive and Gmail
description: Free online 3D model viewer. Open and view GLB, GLTF, FBX, OBJ, and STL files directly from your Google Drive. Supports all major 3D file formats. You can measure, snapshot and create AI renders with nano banana of your favorite 3D Models

name: BabyCheck
tagline: Scan baby food: Spot dangers & get healthier alternatives
description: BabyCheck is the must-have scanner for parents of babies & kids up to 10. Scan baby food, pouches, snacks, cereals or kids' products in seconds ‚Üí instantly detect harmful additives, excess sugars, preservatives, risks with clear alerts. Get personalized, clean, age-appropriate healthier alternatives that are nutritious & gentle. Stop hidden dangers. Reduce allergies, sugars & chemicals. Feed with confidence. Made by parents for worry-free meals. üë∂üçéüõ°Ô∏è

name: Raycaster
tagline: AI workspace for high-stakes documents, not just code.
description: Raycaster keeps protocols, reports, Module 2/3, and quality docs in sync with the science. Your drug development teams ship stronger submissions with far less rework.
